vecUnachieved.strDescription: As Innocent, vote out an Innocent
As Innocent, vote out 10 Infected players
As Infected, vote out 5 Innocent players

data.strFullDescription:
[p]Deceit 2 is an online social deduction horror game. Inspire fear as the Infected, play detective as the Innocent, or create mayhem as the Cursed. Trapped with friends and strangers: who can you trust to help you escape? [/p][h2]THE TEAMS[/h2][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2064870/extras/Steam_Storepage_InnocentBanner.png?t=1751538184[/img][/p][h2]THE INNOCENT: SURVIVE AND ESCAPE[/h2][list][*][p]Stay alive and outwit the Infected or meet a grim fate. 
[/p][/*][*][p]Complete tasks around the map to bring you closer to obtaining the escape key.
[/p][/*][*][p]Investigate suspicious activity and keep an eye on your fellow playersâ€™ actions.
[/p][/*][/list][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2064870/extras/Steam_Storepage_InfectedBanner__1_.png?t=1751538184[/img][/p][h2]THE INFECTED: DECEIVE AND KILL[/h2][list][*][p]Transform and execute other players to whittle down the ranks of the Innocent.
[/p][/*][*][p]Discover Mutation perks and give you even stronger powers.
[/p][/*][*][p]Earn the trust of your team: blend in and wait for the moment to strike.
[/p][/*][/list][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2064870/extras/Cursed.png?t=1751538184[/img][/p][h2]THE CURSED: CONFUSION AND MAYHEM[/h2][list][*][p]Deceive Infected and Innocents alike and avoid suspicion. 
[/p][/*][*][p]Become a true agent of chaos, and exploit your curse to win the game your way.
[/p][/*][*][p]Unlock ever stronger curses as you outwit friend and foe.
[/p][/*][/list][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/2064870/extras/Steam_Storepage_MasteryBanner_Gold.png?t=1751538184[/img][/p][h2]MASTER THE RITUAL[/h2][list][*][p]Climb the ranks of Ascension to become a master of Deceit.
[/p][/*][*][p]Unlock new items to help you escape, and unleash new Mutations to give you an edge as the Infected.
[/p][/*][*][p]Expand your wardrobe with epic character and item cosmetics.
[/p][/*][/list]
data.strSnippet: Deceit 2 is an online social deduction horror game. Inspire fear as the Infected, play detective as the Innocent, or create mayhem as the Cursed. Trapped with friends and strangers: who can you trust to help you escape?
